name: Lucid Trip
description:
Alice in Wonderland but you're just a little guy! Submission for the Laguna College of Art and Design's 48 Hour Game Jam !

Theme: The Environment Changes You!

Controls:

Movement: WASD

Jump: Space

Mushroom Usage: 
Growth: 1

Shrink: 2

Sink:  3

Float: 4

Contributors: 

Kiana Burnett: UI/UX & Unity Engineer

Mikella Nuzen: Artist & Unity Engineer

Cheyenne Isola: Artist & Unity Engineer

Heather Wright: Artist & Unity Engineer
